questions.text: Which of the four diagrams below correctly shows how the parts of the breadboard are connected?
The photo below shows an electric circuit with an open switch. When the switch is closed, what will happen?

answerChoices.text: The light bulbs will not light and no current will flow.
The light bulbs will not light, and the batteries will begin to get warm.
The light bulbs will light. If one bulb is removed, the other will stay on.
The light bulbs will light. If one bulb is removed, the other will turn off.
